subject: World Series
Baseball
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Welch overcame alcoholism in becoming one the hardest throwers of his era, winning a Cy Young Award and pitching in four World Series for the Dodgers and the A’s.
snippet: Welch overcame alcoholism in becoming one the hardest throwers of his era, winning a Cy Young Award and pitching in four World Series for the Dodgers and the A’s.
